The IQ test is a type of puzzle that requires the use of spatial reasoning and problem-solving skills. It is designed to test a person's ability to think logically and make connections between different pieces of information.

In this particular IQ test, you will be presented with an existing picture on the left and four picture options on the right. Your task is to determine which of the four options can be folded from the existing picture.

To solve this IQ test, you will need to carefully examine the existing picture and the four options, and look for any patterns or similarities that can help you identify which option can be folded from the existing picture.

Once you have identified the correct option, you can write it down and move on to the next IQ test. Remember to think logically and use your spatial reasoning skills to solve the puzzle. Good luck!
